Localization.Name: Ma's Ready to Eat Traveler's Day Dinner
Localization.Description:
NDR: 40
Effects: Dehydrating, Hyper-Metabolic

Ma's Ready to Eat Traveler's Day Dinner has the traditional taste of this festive meal with all the favorites you love and the convenience your busy life demands.
